original_text: Analyst Report: NextEra Energy, Inc. NextEra Energy increases financial expectations and extends outlook by an additional year through 2023; board of directors approves four-for-one stock split; NextEra Energy to present at a financial conference tomorrow

scores.News_content: Analyst Report: NextEra Energy, Inc. NextEra Energy increases financial expectations and extends outlook by an additional year through 2023; board of directors approves four-for-one stock split; NextEra Energy to present at a financial conference tomorrow
